name: SixEstate Communications
tag_list: blogging, professional-blogging, content-development, seo, search-engine-optimization, sixestate, online-publicity
overview:
SixEstate is a content marketing startup that produces top blogs for clients around their most important topics, issues, and causes through a service called Newsblogging – an ethical, effective and team approach to professional blogging.

Developed as an alternative to ghost blogging and low-quality content development – both of which can backfire to damage your brand or message – Newsblogging assigns a professional journalist, editor, and SEO pro to blog transparently for your organization, every day, connecting you with news, trends, research or anything else that’s relevant and meaningful to the people you want to reach.
